name: Soul Collector (Clickitygames)
description:
Game Description:

Your fiancé heard some news about her long lost father, and about how he was checked into an asylum in her early years. Longing to meet her father, she travels there quickly. 

It's been 1 week now, and you have yet to hear from her. 

The next day you receive a mail asking you to come to the asylum, and to get a hold of the artifact there. 

Today, you're there at the asylum. 

What happened to your fiancé? 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

Move - WASD

Camera - Use Mouse

Interact - E

Jump - Space Bar

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Objective:

- Collect the artifact.

- Absorb the remnant souls.

- Free your lover.
